PHRASE.LANG: Feel like Balrog from Street Fighter IV with this powerful pair of pugilistic boots! If you want to go pro, you have to dress like it first! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Balrog de Street Fighter IV avec ces bottes de boxeur ! Pour être un pro, il faut s'habiller comme un pro ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit diesen aufregenden Stiefeln wie Balrog aus Street Fighter IV! Wer ein Profi sein will, muss vorher schon wie einer aussehen! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Balrog di Street Fighter IV con questi stivali da pugile! Per essere un vero pugile, vestiti come uno di loro! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este par de botas de boxeador y siéntete como Balrog de Street Fighter IV! ¡Ideales para entrenar! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 バイソンになりきることができるブーツ プロボクサーを目指すならこのブーツ！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 발로그가 되는 부츠. 프로 복서를 목표로 하고 있다면 이 부츠! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Balrog from Street Fighter IV with this powerful pair of pugilistic boots! If you want to go pro, you have to dress like it first! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為Balrog的靴子。若想成為一個職業拳擊手就是要穿這種靴子！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
